name: GDS LLC
tagline: Custom ERP, CRM, web-services, ML, Blockchain
description:
Established in 2007 Global Data Solutions (GDS) is a software development company. We have successfully partnered and support many clients in various regions including the USA, Europe and Russia.
 
Our main focus has been on ERP and CRM system development and implementation but extending to system administration, business automation systems, Web services and mobile applications development. WE also offer blockchain development and consulting, data science and other mathematical services.
Our team consists of a systems administration department team of experienced staff with server administration, cloud services deployment and integration as well as high workload system deployment and optimisation experience.   
We are currently located in the russian scientific center (Novosibirsk, Akademgorodok) and can offer a highly scalable, skilled and very experienced on-demand team of specialists for your project and maintenance requirements.
